segments.text: It's truly incredible how absorbed this woman is in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so dedicated to polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is completely calm, utterly peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She literally has one foot submerged in a growing puddle of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she feel the cold, wet sensation?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's in her own little world, oblivious to the impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is right in front of her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children are making such a racket with their cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How could she not hear or sense any of this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a level of focus I can only dream of possessing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This complete detachment is almost frustrating to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to get her attention before things get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and point out the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astounding how oblivious she remains.
segments.speaker: PAR
